message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with few-shot text classification, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses meta-learning, which is a popular technique in machine learning, and leverages distributional signatures, which are related to word embeddings and distributional semantics. Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CV (Computer Vision) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with classification tasks, which are related to information retrieval (IR), so cs.IR is also a possible sub-category.
